lines.text: Well, uh, he mixed up that concrete mix in the tub...
I'd ask why we don't see any mix bags around, but I guess those are probably at the bottom of the tub.
Or at the bottom of that gross trash pile in the corner, which I'm not digging through.
But, like... I don't know if we'll find the <c=#FF00FF>why</c> by looking at this again.
